synopsis.text: Shinsaku Takasugi and Kogorou Katsura, two young samurai from Choshu, continue their quest in "Bakumatsu Crisis" to secure the Time-Dragon's Heart, a powerful artifact capable of manipulating time. In the aftermath of a fierce battle with Mugensai, their mission to restore their beloved Japan seems more elusive than ever. As they chase a mysterious thief who has stolen the artifact, they find themselves in a drastically altered Kyoto, now under the rule of the deity Susanoo. Despite the unexpected turn of events, the pair remains resolute in their mission to reset time and save their nation from those seeking to exploit it. However, when the legendary treasure reemerges with a will of its own, wreaking havoc, Takasugi and Katsura must rise to the challenge and put an end to the chaos enveloping their homeland.
